TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 对象指定操作的惯性行为。You can use the object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation. 您可以使用 、和属性分别指定每种操作的惯性行为 。You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the , , and properties. 每个属性都是表示惯性行为的对象类型，在每种情况下，你可以指定以下内容：Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - 惯性开始时的初始速度。The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins. - 惯性结束时操作所需的位置。The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. - 惯性所需的减速度。The desired deceleration of the inertia. 通常，可以在惯性结束时指定所需的操作位置，也可以指定惯性的所需减速度，但不能同时指定这两者。You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例显示了 事件处理程序，并为惯性期间使用的转换、扩展和旋转设置了所需的减速度。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 本示例摘自 [演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法成功，则默认情况下， 会将以前的触摸事件作为鼠标按下、鼠标移动或鼠标按下事件发送到元素，并且不会发生将来操作事件。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ ExpansionBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置延伸惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.

value.span: 延伸惯性运动减慢的速率

span.span: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置属性来指定惯性开始时的初始速度 。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定惯性结束时所需的操作扩展 。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定所需的惯性减速度 。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 通常，您可以设置 或 ，但不能同时设置二者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多个联系点启动了该操作，则该 属性是所有联系点之间的点。If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the property is the point between all of the points of contact. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置属性来指定惯性开始时的初始速度 。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定惯性结束时所需的操作旋转 。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定所需的惯性减速度 。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 通常，您可以设置 或 ，但不能同时设置二者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置属性来指定惯性开始时的初始速度 。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定惯性结束时所需的操作位置 。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定所需的惯性减速度 。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 通常，您可以设置 或 ，但不能同时设置二者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).
